text: Maggie Wheeler (born Margaret Emily Jakobson, August 7, 1961) is an American movie and television actress. She is best known for her role as Janice Litman Goralnik on the sitcom Friends. She was born in Manhattan, New York on August 7, 1961. Wheeler is married to Daniel Wheeler. They have two children together. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors
title: Maggie Wheeler
